alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 8:03PM EST until March 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana...Kentucky... Ohio River at Mount Vernon, J.T. Meyers Dam, and Shawneetown. .The Ohio River is in the midst of cresting. Minor flooding will end by or before early this weekend. For the Ohio River...including Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 37.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning and continue falling to 21.8 feet Saturday, March 18. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
